/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the sun. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. Above, the sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural light.
